mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.name AS "name", a.phone AS "phone", a.hotel_id AS "hotelId", a.id_num AS "idNum", a.birthday AS "birthday", a.gender AS "gender", a.home_address AS "homeAddress", a.department_id AS "departmentId", a.post_id AS "postId", a.contract_period AS "contractPeriod", a.status AS "status", a.user_id AS "userId"
LEFT JOIN sys_office departmentId ON departmentId.id = a.department_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO staff( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, name, phone, hotel_id, id_num, birthday, gender, home_address, department_id, post_id, contract_period, status, user_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{hotelId}, #{idNum}, #{birthday}, #{gender}, #{homeAddress}, #{departmentId}, #{postId}, #{contractPeriod}, #{status}, #{userId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE staff SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, hotel_id = #{hotelId}, id_num = #{idNum}, birthday = #{birthday}, gender = #{gender}, home_address = #{homeAddress}, department_id = #{departmentId}, post_id = #{postId}, contract_period = #{contractPeriod}, status = #{status}, user_id = #{userId} WHERE id = #{id}
